GeoIp2.CannotFindGeoIPDatabaseInArchive: No valid DBIP / GeoIP database could be found in tar archive %1$s!
GeoIp2.CannotUnzipGeoIPFile: Could not unzip GeoIP file in %1$s: %2$s
GeoIp2.LocationProviderDesc_Php: This location provider is the simplest to install as it does not require server configuration (ideal for shared hosting!). It uses a DBIP or GeoIP 2 database and MaxMind's PHP API to accurately determine the location of your visitors.
GeoIp2.LocationProviderDesc_Php_WithExtension: This location provider is speeded up by the installed %1$smaxminddb%2$s extension.
GeoIp2.LocationProviderDesc_ServerModule: This location provider uses the GeoIP 2 module that has been installed in your HTTP server. This provider is fast and accurate, but %1$scan only be used with normal browser tracking.%2$s
GeoIp2.LocationProviderDesc_ServerModule2: If you have to import log files or do something else that requires setting IP addresses, use the %3$sPHP GeoIP 2 implementation%4$s and install %1$smaxminddb extension%2$s.
GeoIp2.ServerBasedVariablesConfiguration: Configuration for server variables used by GeoIP 2 server modules
GeoIp2.GeoIPVariablesConfigurationHere: You can configure used server variables %1$shere%2$s.
GeoIp2.ShowCustomServerVariablesConfig: I use the Geoip2 server module (Nginx, Apache...) and want to configure server variables
